name: Sleepy Chick
description:
Any critical comment is welcome, we would appreciate if you play and critisize our game. This game is made in a seven day deadline for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

VOTE FOR US!  https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-7/rate/1419952

IMPORTANT NOTE!

We have very few levels due to time constraints but we wanted to show you what we can do with our unique game mechanic. We hope you have fun!

We are aware that there are some bugs. Our game continues to Evolve. We will add More Levels and a Level Editor.

Theme: It's not real!

Compatibility with the theme; The theme of GameJam(Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1) we join is "It's not real!".  While we were thinking about what we can do about this theme, we came up with a very good idea. We planned to do a mechanic we've never seen before. What if platforms weren't real in our platform game? Platforms are not actually real and therefore we can use these platforms as we want.

Story; Our main character falls asleep and finds himself in a dream as a chick. He has to pass each chapter to wake up and escape his dream.

Controls; You can move in the maze with the following controls.

  • W: Jump
  • A: Walking left
  • D: Walking right
  • F: Take Platform
  • X: Show/Hide Inventory
  • 1-2-3: Chose Taken Platform
  • LMB: Place Chosen Platform

Cheat: "O" is a cheat key you can pass level directly.
